work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: LCWaikiki is one of the biggest textile company in the world. Working as Software Engineer in IT-HR department. We developed the Time Management Systems which  includes Leave Application, Shift Application, Store Payroll Application and also back-offices’ of these applications. These systems are using internally and by the stores.

work.title: Software Developer
work.description: Worked as a Software Developer in Ericsson R&D. The product is Telecom CRM,  is an integrated billing and customer relationship management product developed to meet the specific needs of the telecom industry, by using Microsoft Dynamics CRM.  We developed the product as multinational team by using agile methodologies.

work.title: Software Developer
work.description: Krizma is a software development company which provides innovative software solutions and services. The company collaborated with the Ministry of Health, BOTAS (Petroleum Pipeline Company) and so on. I worked as a full-stack developer.  We developed  Natural Gas Transmission System,  National Neonatal Screening System, Hotel Reservation System and  Task Management Application. And also, I developed the company’ web page.

work.company: Kent State University IT Help Desk
work.title: IT User Support
work.description: I worked in library’s IT Support team.  We were assisting  students and faculty with a variety of computer-related problems while doing my master-degree. And also, we were diagnostic and handled technical troubleshooting of Kent State University’ system issues.
